name: Experimental Hull Modifications
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_customizable, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Provides a base for all other experimental hull modifications to use. Without this, none of them can be installed or may be with unexpected results.
short: Installs EHM base to the ship.

name: Experimental Hull Unmodification
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_customizable, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Can be used to remove the base hull modification from the ship. Are you sure? <Continue> <Cancel>
short: Removes EHM base from the ship.

name: EHM Test
tags: ehm_externalAccess, ehm, ehm_restricted, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Quantum Disruptor
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Briefly overloads a nearby enemy ship.

Exploits weakly acausal principles poorly understood even before the Collapse. In the present day, the effects may as well be magic.
short: Briefly overloads a nearby enemy ship.

name: Accelerated Ammo Feeder
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Activates an advanced - but jamming-prone - mechanism for quickly delivering ammo to the ship's ballistic weapon emplacements. The mechanism must be re-calibrated and cooled before it can be used again.
short: Provides a flux cost reduction and a brief boost to the rate of fire of all ballistic weapons.

name: Burn Drive
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Temporarily engages a primary burn on the system travel drive of the ship. Provides a massive speed boost for a fixed time at the expense of being able to use shields. The ship runs the risk of full engine flameout on any significant collision.
short: Provides a massive speed boost at the expense of being unable to turn or use shields. Collisions can cause a flameout while the system is active.

name: Canister Flak
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Fires a large number of flak canisters with variable-timed proximity fuses all around the ship.
short: Fires a large number of flak canisters with variable-timed proximity fuses all around the ship. Each canister deals 200 High Explosive damage in an area and is targeted to avoid friendly fire.

name: Chiral Figment
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Cryoflux Transducer
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Damper Field
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Briefly activates an energy field that mitigates incoming damage at the cost of disabling weapons and shields.
short: Briefly activates an energy field that mitigates incoming damage at the cost of disabling weapons and shields.

name: Entropy Damper
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Briefly activates an entropy-dampening field that halves all damage taken and all flux generated, and rapidly repairs all disabled engines and weapons. Disables shields.
short: Briefly activates an entropy-dampening field that halves all damage taken and all flux generated, and rapidly repairs all disabled engines and weapons. Disables shields.

name: Phase Skimmer
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Teleports the ship forward in the direction it's traveling. The system slowly builds up to three charges which can then be expended in short order.
short: Teleports the ship forward in the direction it's traveling. The system can store up to three charges at once.

name: Degraded Phase Skimmer
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Teleports the ship forward in the direction it's traveling. The system slowly builds up to two charges which can then be expended in short order.
short: Teleports the ship forward in the direction it's traveling. The system can store up to two charges at once.

name: Borer Drones
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Deploys several combat-modified mining drones. The drones are highly autonomous and capable of operating far from the mothership.
short: Deploys several combat-modified drones armed with mining lasers. Drones have long operating range.

name: Point Defense Drones
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Deploys a large number of laser-armed defensive drones. The drones can be ordered to closely guard the ship or roam freely around it.
short: Deploys a large number of laser-armed defensive drones.

name: Point Defense Drones
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Deploys several defensive drones armed with light machine guns. The drones can be ordered to closely guard the ship or roam freely around it.
short: Deploys several defensive drones armed with light machine guns.

name: Sensor Drones
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Deploys a pair of drones whose on-board sensors improve the ship's weapon and sensor range. Each drone is also armed with an ion cannon.
short: Deploys a pair of drones that improve the ship's weapon and sensor range. Each drone is also armed with an ion cannon.

name: Gargoyle Drones
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Merlon Drones
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Ravelin Drones
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Termination Sequence
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Supercharges one of the Terminator drones with a brief energy transfer. The drone tracks a nearby target like a missile, dealing massive area damage on impact.
short: Supercharges one of the Terminator drones and sends it after a target. The drone deals 1200 Energy damage and 600 EMP damage on impact, and charging it generates 600 flux.

name: Terminator Drone
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Deploys a single advanced drone that features a phase cloak, a modified phase skimmer, and an arsenal of weapons that would be impressive even on a heavy fighter.

Even more impressive is the mini-fac that's capable of producing replacement drones in combat, ensuring that the host ship is not without escort for long.

The drone also possesses an aggressive delta-level AI personality that allows it to roam much farther from the mothership than most other drone systems - that are either entirely on remote-control, or feature a sub-gamma personality at best.

This design is also unique in that it was created through the cooperation of two rival corporations. Fabrique Orbitale provided the chassis and system designs, while Tri-Tachyon experts were responsible for the controlling AI.
short: Deploys a single highly advanced drone. The drone will be slowly rebuilt if it's destroyed.

name: EMP Emitter
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Activates an EMP generator. Nearby missiles, fighters, weapon emplacements and engines of enemy ships are all targeted and can be disabled in short order.

Unfortunately, on-board weapon systems must be shut down to provide power for this device. The EMP pulses are also not very effective against enemy shields.
short: Generates lightning arcs that quickly knock out enemy missiles, weapons, and engines within range. Mostly negated by shields.

name: Energy Conversion
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Entropy Amplifier
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Temporarily increases the damage taken by the target ship. Generates a significant amount of flux when used.

The duration of the effect is in the reference frame of the source ship; if it phases or otherwise experiences an altered time rate, the duration of the effect will be likewise affected for outside observers.
short: Increases the damage taken by the target ship. Generates a significant amount of flux when used.

name: Fast Missile Racks
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Additional servos and ordnance conveyors allow the ship to quickly reload missile weapons. Activating the system generates significant flux.
short: Reloads all missile weapons quickly. Generates flux when used.

name: Flare Launcher
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Launches flares that distract the guidance systems of incoming missiles and PD weapons. Any missile hitting a flare will be destroyed.
short: Launches flares to confuse the guidance systems of nearby enemy missiles.

name: Active Flare Launcher
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Launches flares that distract the guidance systems of incoming missiles and PD weapons. The flares also track missiles and any missile impacting a flare will be destroyed.
short: Launches flares to confuse the guidance systems of nearby enemy missiles. The flares are fast and actively track the missiles.

name: Decoy Flare Launcher
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Launches flares that interfere with point-defenses.
short: Launches flares that interfere with point-defenses.

name: Decoy Flare Launcher (Single)
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Launches flares that interfere with point-defenses.
short: Launches flares that interfere with point-defenses.

name: Missile Autoforge
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: A fixed architecture nanforge system which allows rapid conversion of pre-formulated feedstock into missile ammunition during battle. The flux output of this process is tremendous so it is not advisable to engage the integrated missile nanoforge system while taking fire.
short: Replenishes missile ammunition when used. Generates flux when used.

name: Missile Autoforge (Station)
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Fortress Shield
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, ehm_require_shields, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Redirects all power from the weapon systems to shields, greatly increasing the efficiency at which damage is absorbed. This process generates hard flux at a steady rate even if the shields are not taking any fire.
short: Reduces the damage taken by shields to a minimum, but generates hard flux while active.

name: High Energy Focus
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Briefly increases the damage dealt by all energy weapons. The capacitor array stores multiple charges, which are slowly regenerated.
short: Briefly increases the damage dealt by all energy weapons.

name: Infernium Injector
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Interdictor Array
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Interferes with the target ship's drive field, disabling some engines.

Generally does not cause a flameout when used against a ship with its engines fully operational, but may do so depending on the engine configuration, as it will always knock out at least one active engine.
short: Interferes with the target ship's drive field, disabling some engines.

name: Maneuvering Jets
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Engages extra thrusters to greatly improve the ship's maneuverability. Also provides a slight boost to the ship's top speed.
short: Provides a brief boost to maneuverability and top speed.

name: Plasma Burn
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Provides a brief engine boost, propelling the ship forward at an extreme velocity.
short: Provides a brief engine boost, propelling the ship forward at an extreme velocity.

name: Microburn
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Provides a brief engine boost, propelling the ship forward at an extreme velocity.
short: Provides a brief engine boost, propelling the ship forward at an extreme velocity.

name: Mine Strike
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Teleports a heavy phase mine to the target area. The mine will slowly track nearby enemy ships and explodes a few seconds after its proximity trigger is activated. Can be used while phased.
short: Teleports a heavy proximity mine to the target area. Can be used while phased.

name: Mine Strike (Station)
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Mote Attractor
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Energy motes deal heavy EMP damage to ships and obliterate fighters and missiles. Using the system creates a temporary attractor point for the motes. The motes automatically target nearby missiles and fighters unless an attractor point is set on an enemy ship.
short: Energy motes deal heavy EMP damage to ships and obliterate fighters and missiles.

name: Phase Cloak
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Temporarily moves the ship into an alternate dimension known as p-space. The ship can still be detected by its phase coil emissions, but can not be hit by any weapons. Flux can not be dissipated in p-space, resulting in a constant buildup that forces the ship to come back to normal space eventually. Subjective time passes more quickly for the ship and its crew while in p-space.

The phase cloak generator is large and has significant power requirements, and so generally replaces shields as a ship's primary means of defense.
short: Moves the ship into an alternate dimension where time passes more quickly. Ship can not be hit by any weapons; builds up hard flux while active.

name: Phase Teleporter
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: The ship instantly teleports to any desired nearby location. Requires zero-flux boost to use.
short: The ship instantly teleports to any desired nearby location. Requires zero-flux boost to use.

name: Plasma Jets
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Provides a brief but extreme boost to top speed, along with a slight maneuverability boost.
short: Provides a brief but extreme boost to top speed, along with a slight maneuverability boost.

name: Recall Device
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, ehm_require_wings, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Teleports all fighters back to the carrier, allowing them to be quickly refitted and relaunched.
short: Teleports all fighters back to the carrier, allowing them to be quickly refitted and relaunched.

name: Reserve Deployment
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, ehm_require_wings, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Deploys replacement fighters that can fight for a short time before returning to the carrier. Can temporarily raise the number of deployed fighters above the maximum wing size.
short: Deploys replacement fighters that can fight for a short time before returning to the carrier. Can temporarily raise the number of deployed fighters above the maximum wing size.

name: Phase Skimmer (Drone)
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Targeting Feed
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, ehm_require_wings, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Sends real-time targeting data to fighter wings from this carrier, temporarily increasing their damage.
short: Sends real-time targeting data to fighter wings from this carrier, temporarily increasing their damage.

name: Temporal Shell
tags: ehm, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Speeds up the flow of time on board the ship. Generates a significant amount of flux when used.

Research on prolonged exposure to the effect was described as 'worrying' and quietly halted.
short: Speeds up the flow of time on board the ship. Generates a significant amount of flux when used.

name: Full Burn
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Dynamic Stabilizer
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Lidar Array
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Nova Burst
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Orion Device
tags: ehm, ehm_restricted, ehm_sr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special

name: Mass Energy Retrofit
tags: ehm, ehm_wr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Changes all of the %s slots to %s, %s and %s slots to %s types.

If the ship has a built-in %s hull modification, replaces it with an energy version.
short: Changes all Ballistic slots to Energy slots, and all Missile slots to Synergy slots.

name: Mass Ballistic Retrofit
tags: ehm, ehm_wr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Changes all of the %s slots to %s, %s and %s slots to %s types.
short: Changes all Energy slots to Ballistic slots, and all Missile slots to Composite slots.

name: Mass Missile Retrofit
tags: ehm, ehm_wr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Adds %s support to every slot; %s slots become %s, %s slots become %s and %s slots become %s.

Increases OP cost of all missile weapons by %s depending on the weapon size.

If the ship has a built-in %s hull modification, suppresses it.
short: Changes all Energy slots to Ballistic slots, and all Missile slots to Composite slots.

name: Mass Universal Retrofit
tags: ehm, ehm_wr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Changes all slots to %s type.
short: Changes all slots to Universal ones.

name: Mass Small Universal Retrofit
tags: ehm, ehm_wr, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Changes all %s slots to %s type. Cheaper than other retrofits as this only affects small slots.
short: Changes all small slots to Universal ones.

name: Adapter Activator
tags: ehm, ehm_ar, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Activates the %s on the weapon slots of the ship. Adapters turn bigger slots into smaller ones.
short: Weapon slots with a shunt on them will provide bonuses based on the shunt type.

name: Converter/Diverter Activator
tags: ehm, ehm_ar, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Activates the %s and the %s on the weapon slots of the ship. Converters use slot points to turn a smaller slot into a bigger one. Diverters turn the slot inactive, but yield slot points to be used by converters.

Each slot point %s through hull modifications will increase the %s of the ship by %s.
short: Weapon slots with a shunt on them will provide bonuses based on the shunt type.

name: Mutable Shunt Activator
tags: ehm, ehm_ar, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Activates %s and %s on the weapon slots. Capacitors provide flux capacity bonus to the ship. Dissipators provide flux dissipation bonus to the ship.
short: Weapon slots with a shunt on them will provide bonuses based on the shunt type.

name: Launch Tube Activator
tags: ehm, ehm_ar, ehm_require_no_phase, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Activates the %s on the weapon slots and turn them into a fighter bay.
short: Weapon slots with a shunt on them will provide bonuses based on the shunt type.

name: Over-Engineered
tags: ehm, ehm_mr, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
When built-in to the hull by using a %s, will increase ship's total OP by %s and provide %s.

The %s bonus is dependent on the size of the hull, and can be utilized by %s to increase size of a slot.

Each slot point %s through this hull modification will increase the %s of the ship by %s.
short: Over-engineers the ship when it is built-in. Adds more OP and awards slot points to be used by converters.

name: Logistics Overhaul
tags: ehm, ehm_mr, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
An extreme modification that completely overhauls the ship for pure logistics usage. Strips the hull of any weapons, fighter bays, ship and defense systems upon installation. When built-in to the hull by using a %s, will provide bonuses to fleet logistics.

The stripped parts opens up enough room which is reserved for %s. The remaining room is converted into fuel and cargo storage; weapon slots grant %s, fighter bays grant %s, ship and defense systems (if any) grant %s bonus.

Military hulls are converted into civilian ones, and their %s are reduced by %s.
short: Extreme modification that strips the ship of any offensive and defensive capabilities in favour of fleet wide logistics capability.

name: Auxiliary Generators
tags: ehm, ehm_mr, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
Depending on the ship size, %s ordnance points are exchanged with %s slot points.

Each slot point %s through this hull modification will increase the %s of the ship by %s.
short: Exchanges some ordnance points with slot points.

name: AI Switch
tags: ehm, ehm_mr, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc:
On automated ships, suppresses automation. A %s will be required to maintain the ship, and a %s may be assigned. The ship will %s a CR penalty, but will also be %s to deploy.

On other ships, provides automation. An %s can be installed, and the ship will require %s to function. The ship will %s the automated ship CR penalty, but will be %s to deploy.

No matter the ship's new state, %s skill is necessary to properly utilize this hull modification.
short: Add/Remove ship automation.

name: Heavy Energy Integration
desc: Reduces the ordnance point cost of large energy weapons by %s.
short: Reduces ordnance point cost of large energy weapons.

name: Red Shields
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_sc, ehm_customizable, ehm_require_shields, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Customizable shield cosmetic that replaces shield colours with custom ones. Default colour is red.
short: Customizable shield colours, default red.

name: Green Shields
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_sc, ehm_customizable, ehm_require_shields, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Customizable shield cosmetic that replaces shield colours with custom ones. Default colour is green.
short: Customizable shield colours, default green.

name: Blue Shields
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_sc, ehm_customizable, ehm_require_shields, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Customizable shield cosmetic that replaces shield colours with custom ones. Default colour is blue.
short: Customizable shield colours, default blue.

name: High-Tech Shields
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_sc, ehm_require_shields, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Shield cosmetic retrofit that replaces the shield colours with high-tech ones.
short: High-tech shields colours.

name: Low-Tech Shields
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_sc, ehm_require_shields, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Shield cosmetic retrofit that replaces the shield colours with low-tech ones.
short: Low-Tech shield colours.

name: Midline Shields
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_sc, ehm_require_shields, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Shield cosmetic retrofit that replaces the shield colours with midline ones. Even though midline doesn't have their own shield colours, this imitates a yellow one that suits their ships.
short: Midline shield colours.

name: Crimson Shields
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_sc, ehm_require_shields, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Shield cosmetic retrofit that replaces the shield colours with crimson ones. Pairs well with the crimson engines.
short: Crimson shield colours.

name: Red Engines
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_ec, ehm_customizable, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Customizable engine cosmetic that swaps the engine exhaust flames with custom ones. Default colours are red-heavy.
short: Customizable engine colours, default red.

name: Green Engines
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_ec, ehm_customizable, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Customizable engine cosmetic that swaps the engine exhaust flames with custom ones. Default colours are green-heavy.
short: Customizable engine colours, default green.

name: Blue Engines
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_ec, ehm_customizable, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Customizable engine cosmetic that swaps the engine exhaust flames with custom ones. Default colours are blue-heavy.
short: Customizable engine colours, default blue.

name: High-Tech Engines
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_ec, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Engine cosmetic retrofit that swaps the engine exhaust flames with blue-white ones produced by high-tech engines.
short: Blue-white engine colours.

name: Low-Tech Engines
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_ec, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Engine cosmetic retrofit that swaps the engine exhaust flames with orange-yellow ones produced by low-tech engines.
short: Orange-yellow engine colours.

name: Midline Engines
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_ec, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Engine cosmetic retrofit that swaps the engine exhaust flames with yellow-white ones produced by midline engines.
short: Yellow-white engine colours.

name: Crimson Engines
tags: ehm, ehm_cosmetic, ehm_ec, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, special
desc: Engine cosmetic retrofit that swaps the engine exhaust flames with red-white ones produced by some torpedo engines.
short: Red-white engine colours.
